alert.note: Alert for Allen; Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:14PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Rapides, southeastern Vernon and northeastern Allen Parishes through 345 PM CDT... At 314 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Pitkin, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glenmora, Elizabeth and Union Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central, southwestern and west central Louisiana.
